snippet.title: We're giving The Rogue Prince of Persia a GLOW-UP! (Update Teaser Trailer)
snippet.description:
Coming on 21st November - "The Second Act" update!

Bringing you:
- BIG art upgrade
- More biomes
- More bosses
- New story act + narrative polish for Act 1
- New enemies
- Many Quality of Life additions like multiple save slots & more
- German, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Russian and Spanish localisation

Play in Steam Early Access now - https://store.steampowered.com/app/2717880/The_Rogue_Prince_of_Persia/
